dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Description: Indicate whether this payslip earnings item is considered part of ordinary time earnings (OTE) for super guarantee purposes. https://www.ato.gov.au/Business/Super-for-employers/How-much-to-pay/Checklist--salary-or-wages-and-ordinary-time-earnings/
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: Ordinary Time Earnings (OTE)

dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Description: Single Touch Payroll requires to report residency status of each employee. https://www.ato.gov.au/Individuals/international-tax-for-individuals/work-out-your-tax-residency/
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: Residency Status

dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Description: Single Touch Payroll requires to report on what payment basis each employee is. https://www.ato.gov.au/business/employee-or-contractor/how-to-work-it-out--employee-or-contractor/
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: Payment Basis
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.OptionsForDropdownList:
F ⁠— Full-time
P ⁠— Part-time
C ⁠— Casual
L ⁠— Labour Hire
S ⁠— Pension or Annuity

dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Description: For employee earnings to be properly reported to ATO, you need to specific ATO reporting category. https://www.ato.gov.au/Forms/PAYG-payment-summary---individual-non-business/?page=4
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: ATO reporting category
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.OptionsForDropdownList:
Gross payments
CDEP payments
Allowance - Car
Allowance - Transport
Allowance - Travel
Allowance - Meals
Allowance - Laundry
Allowance - Other
Lump sum A - Termination
Lump sum A - Redundancy
Lump sum B
Lump sum D
Lump sum E
Exempt foreign employment income

dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Description: Indicate whether this contribution is compulsory superannuation guarantee or reportable employer super contribution (RESC) https://www.ato.gov.au/Business/Super-for-employers/In-detail/Salary-sacrifice/Salary-sacrificing-super---information-for-employers/
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: ATO reporting category
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.OptionsForDropdownList:
Superannuation guarantee
Reportable employer super contribution

dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: ATO reporting category
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.OptionsForDropdownList:
PAYG
Workplace giving
Union / association fees

dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Description:
This is to indicate whether supplier is a contractor providing building and construction services.
https://www.ato.gov.au/Business/Reports-and-returns/In-detail/Examples-of-building-and-construction-services/?anchor=Whatarebuildingandconstructionservices#Whatarebuildingandconstructionservices
dcb382dc-a4e0-4354-a845-b7d647f610f7.Name: Include this supplier in Taxable Payments Annual Report (TPAR)

91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Description:
Single Touch Payroll (STP) is a new way of reporting tax and super information to ATO.

- Large employers with 20 or more employees should now be reporting through STP, or have applied to ATO for a later start date.
- Small employers with 19 or less employees will need to report through STP any time before 30 September 2019. ATO will grant deferrals to any small employer who requests additional time to start STP reporting.
- ATO will offer micro employers (1 to 4 employees) help to transition to STP and a number of alternative options – such as allowing those who rely on a registered tax or BAS agent to report quarterly for the first two years, rather than each time payroll is run.

ATO claims there will be no penalties for mistakes, missed or late reports for the first year.
91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Name: Single Touch Payroll Worksheet
Template: {% assign abn = business.CustomFields["0fba87ee-0386-401a-8d1f-302313b663f4"] %}
{% assign period = transactions | between: report.From, report.To %}
{% assign period_W1_amount = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Gross payments' %}
{% assign period_W2_amount = period | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'PAYG' | reversesign %}
{% assign fyStart = report.From | set_day: 1 | set_month: 7 %}
{% if fyStart > report.From %}{% assign fyStart = fyStart | add_years: -1 %}{% endif %}

{% assign csv = "Entity ABN,Period W1 value,Period W2 value,Pay period start date,Pay period end date,Employee TFN,Payroll number,Resident code,Basis of employment code,Family name,Given name,Middle name,Date of birth,Hired date,Termination date,Address 1,Address 2,Suburb,State/territory,Postcode,Country,Email,Phone,Final EOY pay indicator,Employee gross pay,Employee CDEP,Foreign income,Employee tax,Super guarantee amount,SG earnings amount,Reportable Employer Super Contribution (RESC),Car allowance,Transport allowance,Laundry allowance,Meal allowance,Travel allowance,Other allowance 1 description,Other allowance 1 value,Union fees,Workplace giving,Labour hire gross,Labour hire PAYG,Working holiday maker gross,Working holiday maker PAYG,Foreign resident gross,Foreign resident PAYG,Lump sum A indicator,Lump sum A amount,Lump sum B amount,Lump sum D amount,Lump sum E amount" %}
{% capture newLine %}
{% endcapture %}
{% assign transactionsPerEmployee = transactions | between: fyStart, report.To | group_by_employee %}

{% for e in transactionsPerEmployee %}{% assign employee_tfn = e.Key.CustomFields["8067ce2d-6a48-45f1-a5a9-5e2d923e9cc7"] %}{% assign employee_code_size = e.Key.Code | strip | size %}{% if employee_code_size > 0 %}{% assign employee_payroll_number = e.Key.Code | strip %}{% else %}{% assign employee_payroll_number = e.Key.Key %}{% endif %}{% assign employee_residency_status = e.Key.CustomFields["1f6483e5-5ad9-4181-a9db-117827b67a9d"] %}{% assign employee_payment_basis_code = e.Key.CustomFields["6b837666-1039-4cfc-948b-5c36b30682c2"] | slice: 0 %}{% assign employee_middle_name = "" %}{% assign employee_name_parts = e.Key.Name | words %}{% for employee_name_part in employee_name_parts %}{% if forloop.first == true %}{% assign employee_given_name = employee_name_part %}{% elsif forloop.last == true %}{% assign employee_family_name = employee_name_part %}{% else %}{% capture employee_middle_name %}{{ employee_middle_name }} {{ employee_name_part }}{% endcapture %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% assign employee_address_2 = "" %}{% assign employee_suburb_state = "" %}{% assign employee_suburb = "" %}{% assign employee_address_lines = e.Key.Address | lines %}{% for employee_address_line in employee_address_lines %}{% if forloop.first == true %}{% assign employee_address_1 = employee_address_line %}{% elsif forloop.last == true %}{% assign employee_suburb_state_postcode = employee_address_line %}{% else %}{% assign employee_address_2 = employee_address_2 | append: employee_address_line | append: ' ' %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% assign employee_suburb_state_postcode_parts = employee_suburb_state_postcode | words %}{% for employee_suburb_state_postcode_part in employee_suburb_state_postcode_parts %}{% if forloop.last == true %}{% assign employee_postcode = employee_suburb_state_postcode_part %}{% else %}{% capture employee_suburb_state %}{{ employee_suburb_state }} {{ employee_suburb_state_postcode_part }}{% endcapture %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% assign employee_suburb_state_parts = employee_suburb_state | words %}{% for employee_suburb_state_part in employee_suburb_state_parts %}{% if forloop.last == true %}{% assign employee_state = employee_suburb_state_part %}{% else %}{% capture employee_suburb %}{{ employee_suburb }} {{ employee_suburb_state_part }}{% endcapture %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{% assign employee_gross_pay = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Gross payments' %}{% assign employee_cdep = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'CDEP payments' %}{% assign employee_exemptForeignEmploymentIncome = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Exempt foreign employment income' %}{% assign employee_payg = e.Value | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'PAYG' | reversesign %}{% assign employee_sg_amount = e.Value | where_payslip_contribution_item: '8ce55e79-ec7a-4e5d-a41f-84c7b7b7189e', 'Superannuation guarantee' %}{% assign employee_ote = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '07fb0059-a29a-4d7a-8a7c-64f63311c05c', 'Yes' %}{% assign employee_resc = e.Value | where_payslip_contribution_item: '8ce55e79-ec7a-4e5d-a41f-84c7b7b7189e', 'Reportable employer super contribution' %}{% assign employee_carAllowance = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Car' %}{% assign employee_transportAllowance = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Transport' %}{% assign employee_laundryAllowance = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Laundry' %}{% assign employee_mealAllowance = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Meals' %}{% assign employee_travelAllowance = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Travel' %}{% assign employee_otherAllowance = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Other' %}{% assign employee_unionFees = e.Value | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'Union / association fees' | reversesign %}{% assign employee_workplaceGiving = e.Value | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'Workplace giving' | reversesign %}{% if employee_payment_basis_code == "L" %}{% assign employee_labour_hire_gross = employee_gross_pay %}{% assign employee_labour_hire_payg = employee_payg %}{% endif %}{% if employee_residency_status == "Working Holiday Maker" %}{% assign employee_working_holiday_gross = employee_gross_pay %}{% assign employee_working_holiday_payg = employee_payg %}{% endif %}{% if employee_residency_status == "Non-resident" %}{% assign employee_non_resident_gross = employee_gross_pay %}{% assign employee_non_resident_payg = employee_payg %}{% endif %}{% assign employee_lumpSumATermination = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump sum A - Termination' %}{% assign employee_lumpSumATerminationBalance = employee_lumpSumATermination | balance %}{% assign employee_lumpSumARedundancy = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump Sum A - Redundancy' %}{% assign employee_lumpSumARedundancyBalance = employee_lumpSumARedundancy | balance %}{% assign employee_lumpSumAIndicator = "" %}{% assign employee_lumpSumA = nil %}{% if employee_lumpSumATerminationBalance != 0 %}{% assign employee_lumpSumAIndicator = "T" %}{% assign employee_lumpSumA = employee_lumpSumATermination %}{% endif %}{% if employee_lumpSumARedundancyBalance != 0 %}{% assign employee_lumpSumAIndicator = "R" %}{% assign employee_lumpSumA = employee_lumpSumARedundancy %}{% endif %}{% if employee_lumpSumA != nil %}{% endif %}{% assign employee_lumpSumB = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump Sum B' %}{% assign employee_lumpSumD = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump Sum D' %}{% assign employee_lumpSumE = e.Value | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump Sum E' %}{% capture csv %}{{ csv }}{{ newLine }}{{ abn }},{{ period_W1_amount | balance }},{{ period_W2_amount | balance }},{{ report.From | date: 'd/M/yyyy' }},{{ report.To | date: 'd/M/yyyy' }},"{{ employee_tfn | strip }}","{{ employee_payroll_number }}","{{ employee_residency_status }}","{{ employee_payment_basis_code }}","{{ employee_family_name | strip }}","{{ employee_given_name | strip }}","{{ employee_middle_name | strip }}","{{ e.Key.CustomFields.f6859bbb-1736-4e60-81f2-2703a9ea4686 | date: 'd/M/yyyy' }}","","","{{ employee_address_1 | strip }}","{{ employee_address_2 | strip }}","{{ employee_suburb | strip }}","{{ employee_state | strip }}","{{ employee_postcode | strip }}","","{{ employee.Email | strip }}","","",{{ employee_gross_pay | balance }},{{ employee_cdep | balance }},{{ employee_exemptForeignEmploymentIncome | balance }},{{ employee_payg | balance }},{{ employee_sg_amount | balance }},{{ employee_ote | balance }},{{ employee_resc | balance }},{{ employee_carAllowance | balance }},{{ employee_transportAllowance | balance }},{{ employee_laundryAllowance | balance }},{{ employee_mealAllowance | balance }},{{ employee_travelAllowance | balance }},"Other",{{ employee_otherAllowance | balance }},{{ employee_unionFees | balance }},{{ employee_workplaceGiving | balance }},{{ employee_labour_hire_gross | balance }},{{ employee_labour_hire_payg | balance }},{{ employee_working_holiday_gross | balance }},{{ employee_working_holiday_payg | balance }},{{ employee_non_resident_gross | balance }},{{ employee_non_resident_payg | balance }},"{{ employee_lumpSumAIndicator }}",{{ employee_lumpSumA | balance }},{{ employee_lumpSumB | balance }},{{ employee_lumpSumD | balance }},{{ employee_lumpSumE | balance }}{% endcapture %}{% endfor %}

91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Description: If your GST turnover is $10 million or more, you must report using the full reporting method.
91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Name: Business Activity Statement — Full
Template: {% assign period = transactions | between: report.From, report.To %}
{% assign gst_free = "14f63584-be71-40ca-9028-1a60e2e2cc90" %}
{% assign gst_free_import_export = "10d8f9dc-db1e-4c87-9480-a696f59aeddf" %}
{% assign deferred_gst_10 = "73952f89-6139-4fd0-a937-165b8ed66ba8" %}
{% assign input_taxed = "f218a321-f83d-4d06-8d02-b52f595cc4fe" %}
{% assign gst_on_imports = "9fe15ead-2138-4f4b-b3f5-398857d08503" %}
{% assign G1 = period | taxcode: gst_10, gst_free, gst_free_import_export, input_taxed | tax_inclusive_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign G2 = period | taxcode: gst_free_import_export | tax_exclusive_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign G3 = period | taxcode: gst_free | reversesign | tax_exclusive_sales %}
{% assign G4 = period | taxcode: input_taxed | reversesign | tax_exclusive_sales %}
{% assign G10 = period | taxcode: gst_10_capex | tax_inclusive_purchases %}
{% assign G11 = period | taxcode: gst_10, gst_free, input_taxed, gst_free_import_export | tax_inclusive_purchases %}
{% assign 1A = period | taxcode: gst_10, gst_10_capex, gst_on_imports | tax_on_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign 7A = period | taxcode: deferred_gst_10 | tax_on_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign 8A = period | taxcode: gst_10, gst_10_capex, gst_on_imports, deferred_gst_10 | tax_on_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign 1B = period | taxcode: gst_10, gst_10_capex, gst_on_imports, deferred_gst_10 | tax_on_purchases %}
{% assign W1 = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Gross payments' %}
{% assign W2 = period | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'PAYG' | reversesign %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = 0 %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = 8A | balance | plus: amountOwingToATO %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = 1B | balance | times: -1 | plus: amountOwingToATO %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = W2 | balance | plus: amountOwingToATO %}

{% if amountOwingToATO >= 0 %}{% else %}{% endif %}
{{ business.Name }}

For the period from {{ report.From }} to {{ report.To }}
{{ report.AccountingBasis }}

{{ G10 }}

{{ G11 }}
Summary

{{ 1A }}

8ATotal amount you owe the ATO (1A + 7A)$

PAYG tax withheld

91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Description:
Simpler BAS is the default reporting method for small businesses with a GST turnover of less than $10 million:

- you don't need to complete a GST calculation worksheet
- if you lodge a paper BAS or annual GST return, the sections where information is no longer needed can be left blank.
91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Name: Business Activity Statement — Simpler
Template: {% assign period = transactions | between: report.From, report.To %}
{% assign gst_free = "14f63584-be71-40ca-9028-1a60e2e2cc90" %}
{% assign G1 = period | taxcode: gst_10, gst_free | tax_inclusive_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign 1A = period | taxcode: gst_10 | tax_on_sales | reversesign %}
{% assign 1B = period | taxcode: gst_10 | tax_on_purchases %}
{% assign W1 = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Gross payments' %}
{% assign W2 = period | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'PAYG' | reversesign %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = 0 %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = 1A | balance | plus: amountOwingToATO %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = 1B | balance | times: -1 | plus: amountOwingToATO %}
{% assign amountOwingToATO = W2 | balance | plus: amountOwingToATO %}

{% if amountOwingToATO >= 0 %}{% else %}{% endif %}
{{ business.Name }}
Business Activity Statement — Simpler

91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Description:
Use PAYG payment summary — individual non-business for payments to payees who:
- are employees, company directors or office holders
- are religious practitioners
- receive compensation, sickness or accident payments
- receive non-superannuation income streams
- receive return to work payments
- receive a non-super annuity or pension.
91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Name: PAYG payment summary — individual non-business
Template: {% assign dayMonthFrom = report.From | date: 'dd/MM' %}
{% assign dayMonthTo = report.To | date: 'dd/MM' %}
{% assign period = transactions | between: report.From, report.To %}
{% assign totalTaxWithheld = period | where_payslip_deduction_item: 'e253ec72-1200-414a-941a-a93f4039a045', 'PAYG' | reversesign %}
{% assign grossPayments = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Gross payments' %}
{% assign cdepPayments = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'CDEP payments' %}
{% assign reportableEmployerSuperannuationContribution = period | where_payslip_contribution_item: '8ce55e79-ec7a-4e5d-a41f-84c7b7b7189e', 'Reportable employer super contribution' %}
{% assign carAllowance = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Car' %}
{% assign transportAllowance = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Transport' %}
{% assign travelAllowance = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Travel' %}
{% assign mealsAllowance = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Meals' %}
{% assign laundryAllowance = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Laundry' %}
{% assign otherAllowance = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Allowance - Other' %}
{% assign totalAllowances = 0 %}
{% assign totalAllowances = carAllowance | balance | plus: totalAllowances %}
{% assign totalAllowances = transportAllowance | balance | plus: totalAllowances %}
{% assign totalAllowances = travelAllowance | balance | plus: totalAllowances %}
{% assign totalAllowances = mealsAllowance | balance | plus: totalAllowances %}
{% assign totalAllowances = laundryAllowance | balance | plus: totalAllowances %}
{% assign totalAllowances = otherAllowance | balance | plus: totalAllowances %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentATermination = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump sum A - Termination' %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentARedundancy = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump sum A - Redundancy' %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentA = '0.00' %}
{% assign lumpSumAIndicator = '-' %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentATerminationBalance = lumpSumPaymentATermination | balance %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentARedundancyBalance = lumpSumPaymentARedundancy | balance %}
{% if lumpSumPaymentATerminationBalance != 0 %}{% assign lumpSumAIndicator = "T" %}{% assign lumpSumPaymentA = lumpSumPaymentATermination %}{% endif %}
{% if lumpSumPaymentARedundancyBalance != 0 %}{% assign lumpSumAIndicator = "R" %}{% assign lumpSumPaymentA = lumpSumPaymentARedundancy %}{% endif %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentB = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump sum B' %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentD = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump sum D' %}
{% assign lumpSumPaymentE = period | where_payslip_earnings_item: '8198caf2-1125-4f8e-9469-527583e3ea5e', 'Lump sum E' %}
{% assign grossPaymentsType = 'S' %}
{% if report.Employee.CustomFields["1f6483e5-5ad9-4181-a9db-117827b67a9d"] == "Working Holiday Maker" %}{% assign grossPaymentsType = 'H' %}{% endif %}
{% if report.Employee.CustomFields.["6b837666-1039-4cfc-948b-5c36b30682c2"] == "S ⁠— Pension or Annuity" %}{% assign grossPaymentsType = 'P' %}{% endif %}

91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Description:
You may need to lodge a Taxable payments annual report (TPAR) by 28 August each year if you are a business providing:

- building and construction services
- cleaning services - for contractor payments from 1 July 2018 (first report due by 28 August 2019)
- courier services - for contractor payments from 1 July 2018 (first report due by 28 August 2019)
- road freight services – for contractor payments from 1 July 2019 (first report due by 28 August 2020)
- information technology (IT) services – for contractor payments from 1 July 2019 (first report due by 28 August 2020)
- security, investigation or surveillance services – for contractor payments from 1 July 2019 (first report due by 28 August 2020)

The TPAR tells ATO about payments that are made to contractors for providing services. Contractors can include subcontractors, consultants and independent contractors. They can be operating as sole traders (individuals), companies, partnerships or trusts. ATO uses this information to identify contractors who haven't met their tax obligations.
91c2bcbb-1f8c-4aa1-82fd-0ab38c97fb14.Name: Taxable Payments Annual Report (TPAR)

Before you sign this report
Check that you have provided accurate and complete information.
 
Penalties
Be aware that penalties may be imposed for giving false or misleading information.
 
Privacy
The law authorises us to collect information and disclose it to other government agencies.
This includes personal information of the person authorised to sign the declaration.
For information about your privacy, go to ato.gov.au/privacy
